name: Ceci and the Gnomes
description:
Ceci and the Gnomes is a platform game, where you control Ceci(The Protagonist), that is in The Gnomes World after felling accidentally into a hole on the way back of school.

Ceci's objective in the Gnome World is get back home and live her normally life again with her family using a portal, but... where's the portal?

name: One Line: Connect the Dots
description: An addictive brain teaser with simple yet challenging levels. Try if you can connect all the dots with one touch. Your puzzle skills will be tested at each level. Connect all the dots and Win!

name: Sweet Home: Design & Blast
description: Home Design Game! Decorate rooms solving puzzles along the way

name: Left 2 Dating
description: is a 2d puzzle game about dating. You need to help the boy or girl find the other half and complete the date in different scenarios.

name: Our Home
description: On Yonit's birthday, he encountered many horror stories. and this will be a birthday that he will never forget.

name: Zombies Attack
description: Zombies Attack - the mechanics are based on tower defense, 2D graphics with a top view, a memorable and atmospheric soundtrack, colorful and beautiful graphics and unforgettable experiences.

name: Maelstrom
description: Maelstrom is a platformer adventure set on a mysterious island. Explore an island designed in pixel art style, acquire ancient magic to upgrade yourself, defeat enemies and pass obstacles. Use the unique ability 'Rewind' to reach places that seemed impossible!

name: The Game of Life 2: Sweet Haven World
description: The Game of Life 2: Sweet Haven World is ready for any peg dedicated to the art of candy-craft. Go to College and be a Cake Designer, or start your career as a Factoria Technician. Buy the Croissant Cottage or sparkle from the Lollipop Lighthouse. Sprinkle some magic on your life choices today!

name: Yuusha vs. Dragon
description: Kick off monsters and save the kingdom from the Demon King Corps!

name: Christmas Town: Passion House
description: "Christmas Town: Passion House" is a first-person shooter game.

name: Furry Fantasy
description: Furry Fantasy is a match3 game with live2D animations. After a ship crush, main character lands himself on an unknown island. Get to know the kingdom, travel places and discover differect characters on your way. Your main goal is to get the Talisman of Wishes, a long lost treasure.

name: Anvillage
description: In Anvillage you are a knight that needs to build a village by harvesting woods and stones. You will also be building tons of buildings and crafting equipment and other itens.

name: Albert.Data: Slowly Fading into Data
description: A contemplative story of a human, slowly mutating into data. A transformative retro-journey about the meaning of being human, the boundaries of experience, existence and identity. Are you ready for your next existential crisis?

name: Valor & Victory: Shield of Cholm
description: Shield of Cholm is the second DLC for Valor & Victory. Cholm’s emergence onto the stage of historical events of World War II came about as a result of the Russian Winter Offensive of 1941-1942.

name: Lost in Hell
description: Lost in Hell is a single-player game with endless hordes of monsters, grim characters and gritty scenarios! Blast your way through the evils on this atmospheric side-scrolling, with directional freedom to explore and combat, or to flee your enemies and spare ammo.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Bridges
description: Puzzles of Bridges!

name: In to the 029
description: In to the 029 is a horror game based on live-action 3D graphics. Collect clues through simple puzzle solving and investigation. Face the truth through endlessly repeated investigations amid the growing tension and fear.

name: Death Bind
description: Slay zombies in this topdown solo/coop shooter. Both characters are always back to back, try to synchronize with your partner.

name: Gedaria: Fairytale Forest
description: Expansion for the action 2D adventure Gedaria. Solve puzzles with your legendary rakes, rake leaves, create piles or destroy the leaf barrier. Blow the leaves with a wind or leaf blower. NEW control Emil the goose and look for his lost geese.

name: Rock Wrecker
description: Mine what you can and get out with the loot.

name: Blazted VR
description: A Virtual Reality Wave Base Zombie Drinking Game

name: Astroblaster
description: An arcade-style 2D top-down space shooter. Blow up space rocks and space pirates for as long as you can. You'll also need to maximize a delicately-balanced economy of resources. Keep trying to out-do yourself! Five boss ships will break in at various points to make life difficult.

name: The Accursed Crown of the Giant King: Chapter 4 - The Fallen Giant Kingdom
description: The Accursed Crown of the Giant King concludes with the epic Chapter 4, "The Fallen Giant Kingdom".

name: The Accursed Crown of the Giant King: Chapter 3 - Citadel on the Wilderlands
description: The Accursed Crown of the Giant King, Chapter 3, "Citadel on the Wilderlands", follows the party out of civilization into the unsettled north.

name: The Accursed Crown of the Giant King: Chapter 2 - The Duchy of Despair
description: Continue your adventure with Chapter 2 of The Accursed Crown of the Giant King, "The Duchy of Despair".

name: Ultra Ninja Shooter
description: Ultra Ninja Shooter is a physics-based shooting game where you strike ninja stars to destroy the targets. Throw out your shuriken and eliminate all the enemies!

name: Game Over
description: An adventure RPG with rhythm based combat encounters, zany characters, moral conundrums and platforming elements? Oh sorry I didn't know this was a question. Yes.

name: Hanako in the Abandoned School
description: This is a walking simulator game where the story takes place in an abandoned school.You must escape the curse of Hanako and escape alive.Explore the school and collect the materials left behind to uncover what once happened in this school and find a way to escape.

name: Haunted Places
description: Survive in the radioactive zone and fight off all the monsters in your way. With you you have only a pistol and a little cartridge.

name: SG Racing
description: A future-retro racing arcade game

name: Five Nights at Floppa 0
description: You got a job as a security guard at an insurance company, but it turns out that it's not all that easy. After all, your tasks are not only to protect the office, but also to protect yourself!

name: Lost Life: Origins
description: "Lost Life" is an indie horror project where you have a chance to explore a foggy town full of mysteries. A place where worlds collide ready for you to reveal their secrets.

name: Rage Rabbit
description: Rage Rabbit is a fast paced platform game set on an island haunted by mysterious shadows. Shoot down your enemies, explore an interconnected world, defeat powerful bosses and obtain new power ups.

name: Nightmare Rooms VR
description: How did you end up here exactly? There's something familiar about this whole place, as if you've been here in your dreams... or nightmares! So many empty rooms... You must be the only one down here, right?

name: Western Dual Wield
description: Western theme Voxel Graphics Forced-scrolling twin-stick shooter

name: Train Simulator: Midland Main Line: Nottingham - Lincoln Route
description: Explore the eastern reaches of Midlands territory with Just Trains’ latest addition to their Midland Main Line network, which spans 34 miles from Nottingham to Lincoln!

name: Stu: The First AI
description: Stu: The First AI is a Metroidvania set in the digital world of computers and the internet. Exploration is the heart of the game. Discover a vast world with new forms of digital life and humans struggling to control them.

name: Forever Lost
description: Who are you...and what happened at Hawthorne Asylum? Find the answers in Forever Lost, a puzzle-based, psychological horror adventure through a dark, forgotten landscape.

name: Droned
description: Droned is a small, passion project that brings friends together for some good old fashion action. In that spirit, get your friends online and hop straight in some top-down combat.

name: Ceaseless
description: 'Ceaseless' is a top-down action game designed with minimalist pixel graphics, with over 10 playable characters to choose from. Each level is complete with unrelenting enemies, enticing potential items, and a uniquely crafted score. Are you ready to brave the tower?

name: Elimination
description: Elimination is an online, multiplayer, competitive action platform game. Use all sorts of cartoon weapons at your disposal to help you along the way in this fast-paced, arena-style online game. Just remember, the only way to victory is through elimination.

name: Chef: A Restaurant Tycoon Game - Pizza & Baked Goods
description: It's time to raise the temperature and fly to a new dimension of baking! With Chef: Pizza & Baked Goods, it is finally possible to put pineapple on pizza!

name: Dick Ranger
description: Experience an amazing adventure with Dick Ranger, who set off in search of his lost father William, a valued explorer and anthropologist. Travel with the hero through different lands and places.

name: Pigface Massacre
description: Pigface Massacre is a survival horror game can be played up-to 4 players. While trying to stay alive, uncover the serial killer Pigface's bloodcurdling mystery and find out the truth behind events.

name: V.A Proxy
description: V.A Proxy is an openworld metrovania with a fast-paced action rpg combat like Nier, it follows the story of three last machines of their kind as they fight the corrupt ridden world and unravel the fate of their makers to decide the future of all remaining life forms.

name: Qabara the Artist
description: An RPG adventure about the world's most anxious 9-year-old painter.

name: Maelstrom Legacy: Tesla Mystery
description: Maelström Legacy: The Tesla Mystery is a Point & Click / Puzzle game, where you lead the investigation in an anachronistic Paris where Nikola Tesla, organizer of the Scientific Congress, has disappeared. Investigate and unravel the secrets of a steampunk and Art Nouveau Paris...

name: Grief
description: A short visual novel about the day to day life of a grieving women. Join her story and make the right decisions so she can get out of a cycle that seems to have no end.

name: The Corpse Crusade
description: Dark fantasy pixelart hack-and-slash adventure set in a world full of bizarre demons and even more fearsome zealots. Lead a troop of Santifrancan crusaders in a fight against heretics & demons while unraveling a sinister conspiracy.

name: Ultimate Cartridge Collection Deluxe
description: Play three different games in this game compilation! Experience three different adventures filled with colorful characters and various mechanics to solve puzzles and avoid dangers. Maybe what you learn in these games will come in handy somewhere else...

name: Turbo Light Rush
description: Automatic Run&Gun containing 12 levels with retro-futuristic aesthetics. Make the best score !

name: Night Blood: Avenger's Tide
description: "Night Blood: Avenger's Tide" is a side-scrolling action game that takes place in the world's most prosperous city, Atlandi. Players need to control Mark to find his own past, break through the enemy's siege, and finally uncover the huge conspiracy hidden behind the crisis.

name: Magic vs Zombies
description: Simple game of shooting magic projectiles to kill zombies and level up to get stronger and kill more zombies.

name: Crash Course
description: Sin descripción

name: Pop Bowling VR
description: Realize bowlingl sports in VR! 4 stages of realistic scenes (classic bowling zone / rock bowling zone, beach bowling zone / holloween bowling zone) Play from 1 to 4 players on a single device.

name: Caged Beast
description: Caged Beast is a dynamic arena shooter where you play as a robot that destroys everything in its path.

name: Space Monkeys
description: Space Monkeys is a solo-developed, fast-paced action game where you must unleash your inner ape to face 12 unique levels in space. Use skill and strategy to dodge lasers, evade enemies, and collect bananas in zero-gravity on your journey to escape a retro-styled evil space station.

name: Island Elf
description: "Island Elf" is a life simulation game where you will live with a hot red-haired elf on an island...

name: Neet
description: Alone on Halloween? How pathetic. Learn and choose how to live your sorry life, talk to a series of surreal visitors and witness the unspeakable in this highly interactive, soulful and atmospheric life simulator.

name: Chasing Halo
description: It is a team tactical competitive shooting game,which has forged vehicles, novel playing methods,exquisite pictures and shocking scenes. In the tripartite battle of virtual history, we will break through the siege,use exquisite strategies to sweep away thousands of troops and be the winner.

name: Pact
description: Build your alliance of evil as you regain your lost power in this classically-inspired fantasy RTS. Choose how your enthusiastically loyal minions will build, plunder, and pillage their way across an ever-shifting battlefield, guiding them to new opportunities and allies on your path to domination.

name: Knights of the Kitchen Table
description: Giant food monsters are attacking! As a Knight of the Kitchen Table, it is your sworn duty to defeat them in this action-adventure, hack-and-slash, souls-like game!

name: Fetus
description: Fetus is an arcade hardcore platformer set in ancient Rome.

name: Raifu Wars: Puska Character
description: Unlock Puska as a new playable character in Raifu Wars!

name: Big Flying Asteroid
description: A fun little space shooter inspired by the 1979 classic Asteroids.

name: Propeller King
description: Be the propeller king in the battleground! 8 vs 8 matches with online players or bots, destroy the enemy and capture their bases to win!

name: Dragon's Dilemma
description: Journey forth from your cave in this satirical visual novel starring a grumpy dragon! Encounter all sorts of people, obtain companions, and go on dates as you try to clear your (relatively) good name. Includes branching dialog, mini-games, and much more.

name: Animal Wish
description: If you have long dreamed of taking a break from the hustle and bustle of the city or becoming a real farmer for one day, enjoying the gifts of nature, then welcome to the animal farm!

name: Snacky Tower
description: Defeat enemies in a rock-paper-scissors style combat to clear every room. Your steps are limited, so plan carefully and puzzle your way to the top of Snacky Tower! Use gold to increase your chances to win or beat your highscore in endless mode.

name: Hanaja's Body
description: You know what they say: Revenge has a way of changing you. Fight enemies and traverse strange, unique worlds while being slowly transformed by powerful attacks and obstacles which change with you! Turn the tide on those kinky foes by powering up your body with special augments in this fetish RPG.

name: Grandmother's Gift
description: Tomorrow is Winnie's 12th birthday, but when she wakes up, she seems to have entered another world, incredible dolls, people who have long since passed away, is all this a dream or a reality?

name: Scarpone Scamps
description: A gritty, semi-kinetic visual novel about broken people and notorious gangsters, featuring six individualized routes with six different endings.

name: University Stories
description: University Stories - an exciting animated game with lots of different girls. Go on dates with girls and win their hearts.

name: Cowboy Hell
description: Cowboy Hell is a top-down, bullet hell shooter following a recently deceased cowboy and his horse as he adventures through a vibrant open world. Shoot cows, dodge bullets, collect guns, solve puzzles, and befriend characters as you work towards defeating Jeff Bezos himself!

name: Regular Luckiest Guy: Love & Blocks
description: Regular Luckiest Guy: Love & Blocks is a Brick Breaker ecchi game. You’re just a regular guy, who just happens to be around eight beautiful girls. You can learn their stories, break through the layers of their hearts and win their love. Play your shots right and you will... uncover all their secrets.

name: Super Kit: To the Top
description: Leap. Fight. Explore. Experience Lightning Fast VR Parkour in Super Kit: To the Top.

name: Crossfar
description: Fight in massive, fast-paced PVP battles with hardcore team tactics in zero gravity! Choose from five drone classes upon respawns and put your spectacular pilot skills on display to defend your gate, destroy or sneak past the enemy defenses, cross the field and breach the enemy gate on the far side.

name: Sprite Fight
description: An action-based 2D platform fighter with the use of long-ranged combat and the ability to battle your friends. With a series of unique game modes to brawl out in multiplayer, acquire a series of weapons throughout a variety of stages to fend off your opponents and come out victorious.

name: Near the Fear
description: Roguelite racing game set in surreal world of subconscious. Lost in dark corners of your mind, set out on a journey to rekindle forgotten light and find your way home.

name: Forgotten Legends
description: Forgotten Legends is a virtual trading card game, based off of MMO/MOBA style combat. You will need to build a team that can win together and take Victory from your enemies!

name: Leapgate
description: In this sci-fi match-3 roguelite, equip your ship and match in battle to energise your systems, as you leap across the galaxy to save your faction!

name: Tentacles Party With Nuns
description: Carissa, the most popular nun at St. Esther’s Cathedral, had a dream one night about a witch being abused by the Knights Templar and woke up to find the whole church in a strange atmosphere.

name: Game Cycle
description: Relive the bygone era of CD-ROM shareware! As a recently-contracted games analyst, you are tasked by the CEO of Best Value Games to make sure the games set to be included in their upcoming release are up to code. How much you get paid depends on how much ground you cover!

name: Push the Blocks
description: Move the main block to the "X" of the stage. To do this, push some blocks, blow up others, and solve thought-provoking puzzles. Let's relax and burn some neurons?

name: Tater Spud
description: Explore, fight, and platform through a world of deadly plants as a lone potato, Tater Spud, in search of powerups and the answers behind the flora that was once safe.

name: Alabama Bones Adventures
description: Alabama Bones is a classic point and click adventure, streamlined for the modern age. Explore locations across continents and solve simple puzzles to return a variety of museum artifacts to their original owners.

name: Lands of Crown
description: A rogue-like in a medieval, randomly-generated world. Fight, talk, steal, cast spells, complete quests, level up, acquire loot and conduct trades, all to take the Crown. Where Streets of Rogue meets Kenshi, choose your own play style and play as any class, if you can meet them, you can be them!

name: Adventure Forever
description: The Infinite RPG.

name: Candy Girlfriend
description: A fantasy trip to the candy kingdom that belongs to you~ Will you meet the girl you want?

name: Tirsy's Tale
description: As the Age of Dragons comes near an end, join young Tirsy on a great journey to the Land Beyond. Traverse vast locations full of challenges from hostile creatures to nature itself. Meet companions along the way to assist you in reaching the valley of the Drahkin, who harness the power of the dragon.

name: Kingdom's Edge
description: An adventure multiplayer hack n slash in a vertical world. Explore the Deepth with your class to earn knowlodge and recources to build your domain. Play with up to 2 of your Steam firends or solo. The characters have 4 abilities with combos and can be upgraded along the game.

name: Urchins and Ink
description: Urchins & Ink is a twin shooter with a twist! Learn how to properly read and pronounce Japanese while fighting off pesky sea urchins. Help Sumi learn the language and unlock new levels to challenge fluency. Swim quick and think but don't lose your ink to prove practice makes perfect!

name: Stoney's Adventure
description: A 2D Puzzle Action Platformer set in a fully explorable world and beyond.

name: Cyber City Clash
description: Cyber City Clash is a 2.5D fighting in a near future dystopian setting. Battle your way through the various environments of the Cyberpunk city in either single player vs AI, or against a friend in 2 player modes.

name: SCP: Intrusion
description: SCP: Intrusion is a tactical first person shooter that takes place in the SCP universe. Two factions (Foundation Forces and Chaos Insurgency) fight to the death over the control of an SCP facility.

name: Abyss Fantasia
description: The city "Cynthia" on the edge of the abyss, the "missing" girl who didn't know where she came from began to step into the abyss. Experience the complex emotional, mysterious biological environment under the Abyss. Finally face the deepest darkness of the abyss.

name: Chamrosh
description: Chamrosh, The Guardian Of Persia, turned himself to stone with magic for being immortal to protect persian lands forever, and only kaveh the blacksmith's blood can turn him alive again,after thousand years,after the latest generation of kaveh, you are the only one who can turn him alive.

name: Magical Queen's Land
description: Welcome to Magical Queen's Land! Your new part-time cleaning job, clear your way through our gardens, playgrounds and rides as you do your best to finish and leave in time before our fantasy creatures come out to play with the last visitors.. It's just you.

name: Periphery
description: A refugee capsule lands on an uninhabited planet. You have to survive, rebuild civilization and, if possible, regain control over the Earth. One big universe, one endless pvp session for all players.

name: Rat Chef
description: This game is about you playing like a rat. You own a restaurant, and you have to deliver food to your customers and they will come very fast so hurry up!! At the same time as you keep your restaurant up, you should still make a profit on it so you can pay for the food and bills

name: Stellar Watch
description: Spin and strategize for survival in Stellar Watch, a roguelike tower defense. Steer your ship, unlock tech, and enhance drones to outwit enemies.

name: Neighbors: Suburban Warfare
description: NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare is a lighthearted, team-based PvP game about neighborhood warfare! Deploy traps and barricades to defend your own house. Use the tools from your surroundings to acquire crazy item to get the better of your Neighbors!

name: The Binding of Survivors
description: A game of rogue adventure, mowing, coolness, and walking. A group of characters of different backgrounds and abilities have come together to explore the deepest secrets of this evil unknown planet. Defeat the tidal wave of enemies, different bosses, and achieve various challenges and achievement.

name: Witness of the Night
description: Survive the night in an old observatory, helping your friend find the sources of mysterious radiation from outer space.

name: AirShooShoo
description: AirShooShoo is an online multiplayer arena gravity shooter, where you select your armoury for a fast paced combat against each other. Practice speedrunning in solo mode. Use all your weapons and resources to kill, or die just to respawn instantly for revenge.

name: One Step Away
description: One Step Away is a narrative puzzle game inspired by actual events of child trafficking. Uncover two children's vivid escape stories in this bleak and monochrome world.

name: Volunteers
description: This is survival game for one player and for cooperation in 4 players.

name: Solar Nations
description: Rule thousands of worlds and conquer thousands more in this unique take on galactic Grand Strategy. Influence your empire's hulking economy in order to accommodate astronomical military might, then wage strategic wars against rivals and anyone else who would dare threaten your splendor.

name: Lightfire Defense
description: You are the last Lightfire Keeper. Use the power of the elements to protect your beacon from incoming waves of enemies. Explore mysterious worlds to find a way to prevail over the inevitable.

name: Mother Nature: Balance Broken
description: A Wild West turn-based RPG with a character class system based on the animal kingdom.

name: Blocked!
description: Couch multiplayer is back - Blocked! is a local multiplayer party game for up to 8 people that is all about being easy to pick up and start playing. Outsmart your friends in various classic and unique minigames.

name: Dreams with Furry
description: Dreams with Furry - Cleopatra, Mulan and Joan of Arc are now furry girls! Relaxing gameplay and cute atmosphere.

name: Shockwave: Land of the Blind
description: A first-person immersive bomb disposal sim with stealth mechanics that lets you taste the anxious life of a sapper. Work with specialistic equipment to disarm a wide range of explosives. Gather intel to choose the right path in the multi-layered levels and stay out of sight from armed militants.

name: The Last Winter
description: Experience post apocalyptic Finland in this adventurous survival FPS called The Last Winter. Make your way through snowy wilderness while avoiding getting in trouble with wildlife and other survivors. This story-driven masterpiece won't leave you feeling cold even if the setting might be freezing.

name: Trippy Tavern
description: You are the bartender at Trippy Tavern, serving up colorful drinks to thirsty customers. Use your earnings to learn new recipes and rise the ranks, all while dealing with random mods every round -- some good, some bad, and everything in between! Oh, and don't forget to pay the rent...

name: Space Assistance
description: Space Assistance - Top Down Shooter, in this game you have to fight off the attacks of spaceships. Repel all their attacks and land on your planet, but there you will find a surprise. The pursuers will not leave you behind, deal with them.

name: Detective Fantasia DX
description: A corpse has been found on the beach! Explore a summery island to gather clues and uncover the truth in this mystery game, Detective Fantasia DX!

name: A Very Corporate Escape Room
description: This is no ordinary escape room; this is A Very Corporate Escape Room. In this first person 3D puzzle adventure you will solve challenges, unlock secret locations and uncover the dark truth about your manager in a chilling satire of office life.

name: Flappy Butt
description: Flap around as buttcheeks propelled by your own gasses whilst trying to dodge pipes!

name: Entry
description: Hyperultrasupercasual turn-based game where you should create words by adding letters on the field and using it. The middle of the field is a random word with 5 letters. Every turn you can add only one letter and create only one word. Every letter equal one point, so to win just get more points.

name: Orbital Approach
description: Orbital Approach is a Physics based, arcade space game where the highest score rules supreme. Navigate around planets, avoid obstacles, travel through wormholes, and more!

name: Court of Crowns
description: Court of Crowns is a Visual Novel game inspired by Ace Attorney. You play as a Princess Adela de Rex and lead the Crown Curt that resolves important disputes between the Nobility. But what kind of a person is Princess Adela de Rex? Decide that for yourself, thanks to the game's unique Belief System.

name: Animosa
description: Journey alongside the timid knight through this challenging metroidvania full of unique bosses and dynamic enemies. Build trust, unlock abilities, encourage and explore.

name: Hack the Babel Inc.
description: A puzzle roguelike game that gives a broad puzzle experience. More than 100 items give additional rules to the base rule like Minesweeper and create a completely different puzzle strategy. Become a hacker and conquer Babel's servers, where randomly generated puzzles await you.

name: Porcelain Mask
description: Porcelain Mask - is a platformer where puzzles are combined with action, all for one purpose... to kill you. Everything in this world is reaching out to rip you to shreds just so you don't take the next step. After all, there may be something up ahead...

name: Aerofly FS 4 Flight Simulator: Scenery - Europe Part 2
description: Expand your Aerofly FS 4 scenery with over 800 detailed European airports, aerial images, building and tree data.

name: Small Shop
description: Run your own small shop!

name: Sunville
description: In our days it’s hard to find any organic grocery’s in markets. Every city turns into concrete jungle, streets are covered with smoke from manufactures and cars. In Sunville everyone can find peace and freedom, take all your savings and went to Sunville to start new free, fresh and bright live.

name: Anon Hacker
description: A comic style first person shooter where you use hacking tools to shoot code at enemies, collect items and complete quests.

name: Party Words
description: Party Words is a word party game with a bunch of different game modes and a ton of words to keep it fresh! Pass and play with a single device or join multiple devices to unlock new possibilities. Who's the fastest guesser? Who has all the ideas? Whose doodles are the best? Find out with Party Words.

name: Aerofly FS 4 Flight Simulator: Scenery - Europe Part 1
description: Expand your Aerofly FS 4 scenery with over 800 detailed European airports, aerial images, building and tree data.

name: Crate Knight
description: Solve the puzzles by using the environment interactions as Lancelot in this puzzle platformer game. If you find more keys, you will be able to get closer to the more difficult puzzles

name: Alien Gladiator
description: Fight for your freedom in space arena!

name: GTTOD: Lost in Reflection
description: Lost in Reflection is the free new GTTOD prologue featuring brand new, exclusive content and the same intense FPS action. Learn where you came from, how you ended up in the chasm, and why all those chads gotta be thwacked.

name: Momo's Conflict
description: Momo was a new nurse at Harukaze Hospital. She was a hard-working girl who took care of her mother. But she had a weakness, a phobia of men. Then one day, she gets transferred to the surgical department after making a mistake. Will she be able to overcome her trauma and save her patients...?

name: Floor is Lava
description: Floor is Lava, is a 2d platformer where you have to escape an erupting volcano.

name: Colonia
description: In this strategy management game, an evil multinational gave you the mandate to build a colony. Create industries, without destroying the environment, manage logistics, manage population, you'll have to serve its interest. Unless your thirst for power leads you to independence…

name: Shadowsense.
description: Heighten your talent to save the world.

name: Honey Toast
description: Honey Toast is a cute action platformer about a toast trying to find his toaster. Show your platforming skills with unique movement mechanics and defeat the enemies along the way.

name: Age of Barbarians Chronicles
description: Chronicles is a crude and violent action RPG game in pure Sword & Sorcery style. Get ready to live the heroic and bloody adventures of barbarians, amazons, and sorcerers against the insane and omnipotent Sorcerer Gods, absolute masters of the prehistoric world of Atlan.

name: Desstroke
description: Desstroke - is a masterpiece of game industry, цруку you can damage everything you see, and have fun. You can blow everything up, or even jump from the balcony, that's on you. Oh, and SOON you will play with your buddies in a battle royale with cars, many guns and unforgettable community.

name: College Bound: Episode 4
description: Fasten your seatbelts and check if you are alone in the room because FOZ presents you with a brand new part of College Bound - Episode 4 is out now! The fourth part of the engaging adult game has way more content, images, sex scenes (now with sounds), and animations than ever before!

name: Deep Alchemy Dungeon
description: D.A.D. is a dungeon crawling game were alchemy skills play crucial role. Young witch ominous plans were destroyed when she was put in a jail. But she founds ancient laboratory full of secrets and new shining perspectives behind the broken wall.

name: Craggenrock
description: Craggenrock is a crafting shop management game taking place on a remote island after a great disaster. You play as Arlo, a young crafter seeking a name of his own replacing his former crafting master in the mining town of Pareho.

name: The Cecil: The Journey Begins
description: “Cecil” is a survival horror-based game about the mysteries of the famous Cecil hotel, but with a twist. Explore the hotel and find out about the mysteries and untold stories that lie within the halls of horror.

name: Trachi: Autonomy - InvAsion
description: An isometric kinetic novel. The death of AUTONOMY. And a precursor to something new.

name: Celeritas
description: Celeritas is a fast paced runner shooter and platformer, made for speedrunners.

name: Terminus Historia
description: Dark fairy tale / multi-scenario system / fantastic all pixel art! In the boundary called the "Terminus" between human's world and the devil's world,A spectacular war between humans and demons will unfold.

name: The Merchant's Guide to the Kingdom
description: You are an NPC and shopkeeper in an MMORPG world. Trade, craft and manage a guild to acquire the most powerful gear and face dangerous dungeons, world bosses, rare spawns and up to 40-man raids while following the campaign to aid in the protection of the ancient and powerful Elemental Stones.

name: Plop Saga
description: Plop Saga is a indie Pixel art game with beautiful music. In this game, you guide Plop to run and jump to finish the journey with courage and strength.

name: Sexy Gym
description: I love going to the gym! Guide Morris through his training at this unique gym as he gets intimate with his trainer! Fix your diet, get familiar with the equipment, boost your stamina, and hone your focus to see your trainer in glorious Live2D action!

name: Vulgaria
description: Action, adventure, top down, rogue shooter, puzzle, RPG pick ups, randomly generated rooms, pick ups and levels. Fight your way down the dungeon with your shadow at your side picking up treasures, finding and solving puzzles. Discover why you have a missing face, and how your shadow is alive?!

name: Fish Cymophis
description: A fishing horror game where you explore the many fishing locations of Cradle Lake. Fish in its cavernous depths and discover what lies within...

name: That Stupid Game
description: A not-so-serious online multiplayer game with 1st and 3rd person mechanics set in the classic Bomberman style. Bombs, rocket launchers, jetpacks, CTF, crazy rhythmic elements and much more. Includes 3 competitive games modes and a level editor for infinite replayability.

name: Midnight Zone
description: Dodge, Dash, and fall through platforms to avoid death. This Hyper casual platformer is great to play if you're bored at the office or you're waiting for a multiplayer queue and have nothing else to do!

name: Monsters Versus Pals
description: Huge AI Tug Of War Battles Influenced By Powerful Player Heroes

name: Way to the Cake
description: In the game you have to face difficult obstacles. Go through all the difficult places and test yourself for strength. Finally, a delicious cake awaits you ...

name: The Forest of Love
description: A top-down NSFW Furry Adventure game! Meet the neighbors, explore the forest, and unravel the mysteries within! Find out firsthand why it's called "The Forest of Love" with a charming group of raunchy critters!

name: Bloodstage: Possessed by a Tsundere Demon
description: An unknown life form controls the crowds of mutated employees of the space station. Impress the demon girl by destroying thousands of possessed with dozens of weapons.

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 1063 Loco
description: Experience a complex classic on Austrian rails with RSSLO’s authentic ÖBB 1063 for Train Simulator!

name: Telos Pragmaton
description: Trapped in a small house with a deadly monster, use your wits and a mysterious device to survive in this fixed perspective survival horror. Keep the junctions charged so that you don't suffocate, but tread carefully as the monster will lurk in the shadows to hunt you, becoming ever more aggressive.

name: Grand Arms: March of the Red Dragon
description: Squad-based strategy RPG with auto turn-based combat and real-time map movement. Build your army, defend your territory, and lead the armies of Prince Llewelyn to reconquer the scattered kingdoms of Wales from the English invaders.

name: Antrio
description: Antrio is a 2D action-platformer inspired by classic games from the 8 bit era. Shoot, drill, climb and fly to fight lots of enemies and overcome the challenges each level has to offer.

name: Heaven Work
description: Heaven Work - A clicker game where you have to defeat the demons in time, who are trying to get under the guise of angels to where the gates are closed for them. Click on the demons in time and get points, the more demons were not allowed into the sky, the more points you will get!

name: Kings & Cities
description: Kings & Cities is a turn-based strategy game in which you rule a province on a new continent: Epeiros. War and diplomacy will be required to establish your domination over these new lands.

name: Game of the Dead
description: Gun down large hordes of Zombies and try to survive the night! Game Of The Dead is a casual Post-Apocalyptic Horror game with rogue-lite elements. You can build card decks that will allow you to quickly overcome the odds and help you fight against the thousands of Zombies that get in your way.

name: Dash Rider
description: Dashrider is a fast-paced 2D shooter game, in which you fight your way through countless waves of enemies to earn coins. Purchase new skills or stunning boss battles. Defeat the three guards to face the final boss and complete the game.

name: Timewell: The Trail of Celestes
description: The search for survival leads to a new discovery: An alien signal of a mysterious origin. Humanity’s last hope rests on the shoulders of AI, SAT-V - designed for interstellar travel. Guide SAT-V through a perilous journey where she may be the salvation of humanity or their unspeakable destruction.

name: Winter Things
description: Winter Things is a 3D "find and click" puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the winter town location within a certain time. Only the most curious, patient and sharp-sighted will be able to finish this game!

name: Caddywack
description: In caddywack, you race against the clock to whack a ball into the goal with your car; in this physics-based car puzzle game, you play through 18 different levels, each with its unique set of challenges.

name: Bomjtown
description: The game is a novel in a remote Soviet village. The game is packed with humor, so you will have fun playing it. It is important to carefully read the dialogues to choose the correct answer, there may be several of them. To select the answer, control the arrows and press enter.

name: High Tech Low Life
description: High Tech Low Life is a third-person action-adventure game, set in a world inspired by 1980s/90s Cyberpunk Japanese Manga. Explore districts, with branched dialogue choice, walk and talk, shoot and talk, active reload, slow time and engage in third person firefights with challenging enemies.

name: Spirit Below the Waves
description: Explore, Survive the deep ocean a beautiful new world awaits. Unravel an amazing story about the player at your hand. Experience a roller coaster of emotions in this new unexplored world.

name: Journey to the Pumpkin Planet
description: A turn-based strategy game about managing the first human colony on the pumpkin planet.

name: Meet Cute: Beach
description: Is where anything better than summer vacation? Yes! A summer vacation with a hot girl! Grab your sunscreen, sunglasses, and get ready to have fun with her.

name: Alien Time
description: Alien Time - Tower Defense game in which the player sets up defensive towers to repel waves of opponents that get stronger each time and force the player to use new options for defensive placement tactics.

name: Reality Layer Zero
description: Let us begin the persuasion. Alas, mankind may forever live in absence of the truth. Verily, the resonant threads that extend across the many worlds spawn countless interpretations. Can insight be gleaned from the coalescing dimensions? It may yet all be for nothing. The meaning is up to you.

name: Ragamuffins: Feline Fencers
description: Unique item shop meets card battle game...with cats...with hats

name: Tiny Golf Adventure
description: Challenge yourself in a simple, arcade-like golf game set in a cartoon world and unlock new skills and accessories.

name: RoadRace
description: Choose your little car and race!

name: The Fallen God's Chronicles: Dmet Prison
description: Sent to the prison plane where Dmet the fallen god of carnage is imprisoned, you will have to fight your way back to the primary plane where life still makes sense, but you won't be alone there as others have been sent before and probably you won't be the last to arrive!

name: Fort Flow
description: Navigate this flying castle, fight a variety of enemies, unlock rich cards and stories, and lead the way out of the siege!

name: Chompies!
description: Chompies! is a cute couch / online sports game where you fight for the ball to reach the top of the level and score a goal.

name: Invader Signal
description: Invader Signal - In this game, you choose a certain color of your charge to destroy asteroids flying in your direction, which can change their colors and cluster. You need to be careful when striking, as spaceships are constantly flying in front of you, which cannot be touched!

name: ZombWave
description: A zombie virus has hit the entire planet. the human species is on its knees. You take on the role of a soldier who survived a helicopter crash when returning to a base that was under attack. If you want to obey your order you have to face thousands of zombies.

name: Girls' Civilization 3
description: Open world survival RPG with unique lore and story.

name: Isle of Rein
description: Isle of Rein is a thirty minute adventure that takes place on Rein, an unobserved island in the Hudson Bay. You are a young agent tasked with investigating the research team's communication absence. Upon visiting the island, you must adjust to extreme circumstances.

name: The Dark Prince
description: The Dark Prince is a fantasy romance visual novel about an arranged marriage between a daemon prince and a fae princess. Play as Princess Euphymia Tarafin on a quest to revive her lost magic and save her kingdom from the wrath of the daemons. The story features political tension and enemies-to-lovers romance.

name: Seres
description: There are more than 300 countries on the continent of Seres, more than 6,000 units of Knights, and a lot of events. Which country to choose? What kind of Knights' combination? How to deploy the Knights to the Member countries?Players can make their own decisions to unify the Seres continent .

name: Merchants of Sol
description: Command a fleet of merchant ships in this story-driven strategy game. Manipulate markets, dominate trade, make investments; do anything that you can to get rich regardless of morality or legality. Starve a population of supplies just to sell them later at a massively inflated price? Good idea.

name: Wassie Tale
description: Wassie Tale tells the story of one courageous Wassie & their treacherous journey. Hop, fly, swim & slam your way across diverse levels in this lore-rich, challenging 2D Side Scroller. Do you have what it takes to become the savior of all Wassie-kind?

name: Real Estate Tycoon
description: "Real Estate Tycoon" is a simulated business role-playing game with urban theme. We try to restore the game world like a novel of urban face slapping, and give the players a "capitalist" identity.

name: Night Dreams
description: "This is not the world you should live in" - the surreal words left by the mysterious man who broke into the house, the smooth college life turns out to be a repetitive circle of the same. The only way to return to reality is to face your own heart.

name: Ukraina Battle Tank!: Putin Edition
description: Awaken inside a battle Tank in the middle of nowhere around Ukraine. You have to fight for your life against the invasion of the angry Russian tanks and Mr. Putin junior's henchman while vibing with hardbass. Be the slavic bullet hell.

name: Devil's Deck: Astray Destiny
description: This content requires the base game Devil's Deck on Steam in order to play.

name: Caphaclus Recommence
description: Caphaclus is a world that takes place in a world set in medieval times. Remnants or a more futuristic world exists. Nobody knows much of the past of the planet. You embark on an adventure to discover secret relics and uncover the truth to the planet of Caphaclus.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train Class 68 DRS
description: The Class 68 is a type of mainline mixed traffic diesel-electric locomotive manufactured by Stadler Rail (and previously by Vossloh España) for Direct Rail Services (DRS) in the United Kingdom.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train Class 68 DRS
description: The Class 68 is a type of mainline mixed traffic diesel-electric locomotive manufactured by Stadler Rail (and previously by Vossloh España) for Direct Rail Services (DRS) in the United Kingdom.

name: Unity of Command II: Desert Rats
description: You will take command of the vastly outnumbered Allied forces as they attempt to stop first the Italians, and then the Germans in the form of the vaunted Afrika Korps. From a token force of a few divisions, your army will expand into a vast force of more than a quarter-million men.

name: ChessVR
description: Board a spaceship and commence a game of wit in the vast universe! Take the lead, attack ferociously but defend cautiously, and give your opponent the final blow. You may also follow the ship to travel, guess which mysterious scene you will end up?

name: Rain Ruin
description: FPS walking simulator type psychological horror game. Lost in the mountains and sheltering from the rain in her ruins, she had no choice but to reveal her night in the ruins. As she relies on her smartphone's lights to explore the pitch-black ruins, she hears a cry out of nowhere.

name: Flesh Everest
description: Explore a randomized facility built within a massive living mountain of flesh. Flesh Everest mixes a rogue-like survival experience with shooting mechanics inspired by Silent Hill and Resident Evil. Death is permanent and ammo is limited.

name: Exodus Vigil
description: Explore the Dark and Dangerous Temples and Tombs of Ancient Egypt in this story-driven 3D puzzle game. Follow the familiar story of the Israelite Exodus from the Egyptian perspective.

name: Smashboard
description: Smashboard is a fast-paced action game where you constantly defeat bosses while dodging their attacks and attacking them when you can. As you defeat enemies, you will earn their charms and use them as upgrades to face other bosses after creating a build for your own play style.

name: Wastebraver: A Tiny Survival Tale
description: Wastebraver is a roguelite survival rpg set in a post-apocalyptic fantasy hellscape. Explore an open, dynamic world where evils beyond imagination haunt your every footstep. Execute abominations and weave through insane encounters as you fight for what little remains of your broken world.

name: Mist Guard
description: Mist Guard is an Action RPG where you have to escape a dark, mysterious prison. Explore, fight enemies and upgrade your character to escape.

name: Spellic
description: Spellic is a arcade action wizard shooter. With your keyboard, cast spells like fireballs to defeat your enemies or help your allies in various multiplayer battles.

name: Nightmare Hunter
description: Nightmare Hunter is an arcade game where you have to defeat the coming nightmares.

name: Soul Shard
description: Soul Shard is a 3D platformer, 2-player local coop game set in a Victorian London Steampunk factory. Nimue and her sidekick Ambrose, a cyborg bear, are on a mission to destroy the factory so that it can no longer produce cyborg laborers that the owner has been using to replace the working class.

name: The Mourne's
description: The Mourne's is a work-in-progress relaxing Adventure game with some emphasis on Puzzle Solving and can be done either Solo or with some friends :)

name: Diode Arena
description: Diode Arena is a free to play vehicle arena game where you can build your own custom vehicle and use it in online PvP matches.

name: In the Workplace of Madness
description: A monstrous entity looms over the employees of an insurance company. Theo, A normal office worker, finds himself engulfed in a deadly nightmare with no way out as secrets about the workplace are uncovered.

name: Chemistry World
description: Chemistry World is a game where education and fun are paramount, this game is made with low-end hardware in mind. It is an open-world game with different storylines that contain different chemistry topics.

name: Be
description: Build, relax or explore in a beautiful world. Chill out next to a lake or build crazy structures (with friends!) Choose your own weather & time of day.

name: The Wasted Knight
description: Take control of a knight too intoxicated to remember his own control scheme in this quirky, pixel, procedural, roguelite, where your control scheme constantly changes. Is jump A? Or X? How about RT? Who knows? The knight certainly doesn’t. *Controller required*

name: Space Major Miner
description: Space is dark and full of terror... and raw resources! Mine asteroids, upgrade your equipment and blast cosmic aliens.

name: Perfect Boyfriend
description: Moving to another city is always stressful: new people, new places, new rules. Fortunately, the city is full of guys who will be happy to help you. Who knows, maybe one of them could become more than just a friend, huh?

name: Galxagar
description: "Don't go to Galxagar"; a phrase uttered by many who have traversed its rim. Untold treasures, and terrors, await within its blackened depths. Ready your craft, spacefarer, because you're about to enter the most dangerous sector in all the stars. Get ready.. for Galxagar!

name: Rusty Seas
description: A game about furry girls fighting over junk on the beach.

name: Blade of Ten
description: Blade of Ten is a Fighting Adventure game set in a Fantasy World filled with Mystery. You will encounter a variety of Creatures and Characters, explore Vast Areas and maneuver around the highest of ledges with your Helicopter Jump. Vanquish the forces of evil, or Race against them in Go Kart mode!

name: Alla Prima
description: A starving artist desperate for money and validation joins a religious cult, unaware of the god-seeking ritual she's diving head first into. Explore your environment, solve puzzles and uncover your past to make sense of yourself and the reality unfolding in front of you.

name: Something's Wrong With Sunny Day Jack
description: Navigate your relationships and figure out the truth behind the ghost of a 80s children's TV show host who's been haunting you in this fully voiced R-18 visual novel filled with nostalgia, romance, and horror. Can everyone get their happily ever after?

name: Seqitaire
description: Seqitaire is a Solitaire-inspired, number-crunching puzzle game.

name: Shards of Nogard
description: Shards of Nogard is a powerful, evocative fantasy adventure game that will surprise you with fastpaced combat, mind-boggling puzzles, beautiful hand-crafted environments and an immersive story about the eternal battle set in the medieval fantasy world.

name: Where Is Here: New Home
description: A sci-fi, survival horror and first-person game. The player will encounter numerous of creatures and characters that involves a mystery to be unraveled on all worlds, finding clues and going through portals. The player progresses through exploration and may die if they fail to avoid the monsters.

name: SnailQuest
description: A Puzzle Game Based On 2048 Move Style

name: Vikindor
description: Vikindor - Side-Scroller Platformer, a game with random generation, where the player in each level gets into a randomly generated world of the underworld, with its enemies, unique locations, chests and other traps. Each race will be different from the next!

name: Astrid
description: Washed ashore in a strange unknown land after a shipwreck, Astrid must traverse her way through monsters and men alike in an attempt to return home. Dangers lurk around every corner and she doesn't know who to trust.

name: QuVerse
description: QuVerse is exciting and challenging action matching puzzle. Basic rule is very simple, Make top of Cube to same color. but this world's system is unstable, for matching color of Cube, you should move Logically and swiftly. Challenge your Limit, break the record!

name: Away From Life
description: You are left alone with yourself in the middle of the Indian Ocean, fighting for survival with the wildlife of the nearest islands and the ocean elements.

name: FurBalls Racing
description: FurBalls Racing is a platforming racing game that's fun for players of all skill levels! Roll, wall jump, spin drift, and... shoot poop?... as a squishy, fuzzy FurBall while rushing towards the finish line!... and avoiding poop.

name: Backrooms of Reality
description: A game in which you navigate through backrooms' mazes and solving simple environmental puzzles. Sometimes you may encounter some creatures that live there. The game contains horror elements.

name: Prophecy Matrix
description: You need to find keys and exits in the prophecy matrix, you can use card props to avoid danger。The Prophecy Matrix will continue to grow, you have to crack the Prophecy Matrix's secret.

name: The Ballad of Radolf
description: After years of peace an island emerges from the sea with the Demon race, now the Demon race threatens to throw the world into chaos. Can you stop the Demon race and restore peace to the world in this turn based RPG.

name: Dungeon Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Braaains!
description: Party trivia...but with zombies

name: Lemonade Stand
description: Lemonade Stand for Playdate

name: Tankette
description: Tankette is a small, unfolding arcade game where you are the crew of a tiny tank.

name: Blocks!
description: A puzzle game

name: Block Blitz
description: The classic BBC Micro game ported to Playdate

name: Herbtales
description: An herb picking RPG.

name: Tower Defender: Hero Wars
description: Fight and defend your towers as the head of an army! Make deployment routes, release supernatural abilities, conquer enemy towers and obtain victory. Congratulations, outstanding attack and defense strategist!

name: Cruise Ship Manager
description: Manage your own Cruise Ship! Maintain your vessel and sell tickets to the wealthiest of passengers. Issue orders to your crew and keep their morale high. Choose the layout of your ship and the kind of amenities you want to offer. Keep the prices right, passengers satisfied, and your wallet full!

name: Eternal Hearts: Curse of the Endless
description: Eternal Hearts: Curse of the Endless is an action deckbuilding rogue-like where each battle lets you switch between intense, real-time action and time-stopping tactical breathers. Absorb your enemies' powers, liberate the souls of your predecessors and finally, end your curse.

name: Hello Kitty Pocket Camera
description: Hello Kitty Pocket Camera was a cancelled version of Nintendo's Game Boy Camera. It was only discovered after a data breach in September 2020 which leaked the game online.

name: Diffraction
description:
Otome visual novel with a focus on connections and friendship.

A quiet coming-of-age story about how photography changed the lives of three people in a rainy small town and the paths in life they took with it.

name: Guild Master Manager
description: Explore the world Missions Monsters Dungeons Battles Magic Brave Demon lord Magic. Participate to help the adventurers within the guild. to help adventurers roam the fantasy world

name: Heavenly Puzzle
description: Heavenly Puzzle - a puzzle game for manual dexterity and ingenuity. Assemble the whole picture from puzzle pieces. You can choose the difficulty, where time and number of lives are limited. You simply have to collect them all!

name: Tawako The Forest Hedgehog
description: Help Tawako to go through the forest and collect fruits in this Arkanoid-like game.

name: Missing Persons
description: Missing Persons is a horror-survival game that you play as an officer to uncover the truths behind reported paranormal encounters and missing person cases near Southern California.

name: Ninja Specialist
description: Ninja Specialist is a unique, action-packed beat 'em up utilizing real-life actors. As Joe Kage, the last surviving member of an elite fighting force, you will have to brave the shadows of your own past and rise against the deadly Ninja Empire to obtain the Supreme Ninja Power.

name: AstroTrucks
description: Fly cargo spaceships and deliver materials in a realistic 6-DOF multiplayer simulation. VR and motion platform supported.

name: Dreamward
description: Dreamward started as a student pitch project at Carnegie Mellon University, Entertainment Technology Center. We created a puzzle-solving game experience combining novel gameplay with amazing art and music inspired by Tang and Tubo cultures.

name: L-Racers
description: L-Racers is a minimalistic, retro, 1980s arcade-style old school game where you go head-to-head against another player (CPU or human) and be the last racer alive.

name: Superman
description:
An enhanced version of the Superman game for Nintendo 64 which was cancelled due to license expiration. Although both games are related, the PlayStation version was going to have many improvements over the original game and a complete overhaul on the gameplay sequences, focusing on exploration and combat.

A late prototype was found and dumped online.

name: Rhythm Plus
description: Rhythm plus is a web-based vertical scrolling rhythm game (VSRG), you can make, play, and share any songs from and with anyone!

name: Metagame
description: A proposed idea for a game by MysteryMachineX.

name: To Become a Tengu
description: An office romance otome game with a dash of supernatural.

name: Tophat Quest
description: Tophat Quest! A Pixel Platformer where you play as a purple man with a Tophat going on a quest to save the world! (And meet some new friends along the way)

name: Disgaea 6 Complete: Digital Dood Edition
description: Can a mere Netherworld zombie rise up and destroy a god? Find out in the most recent installment of the Disgaea series! Disgaea 6 Complete includes all previously released DLC, plus the Digital Dood Edition comes with a bonus artbook!

name: Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality + The Lonely Assassins
description:
Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality
Experience an unforgettable adventure through space and time, face terrifying monsters and solve a mind-bending mystery!

Doctor Who: The Lonely Assassins
Amidst a sinister series of events at a seemingly abandoned house in London, someone goes missing, and you find their phone. When it begins to self-destruct, ex-UNIT scientist Petronella Osgood enlists your help to uncover hidden clues and solve cryptic puzzles.

name: K-Pop & Rock Band Manager
description: A new star is born! Favour Toys B.V. Entertainment wants to release a new 4-member Band. You have to choose the trainees who you think are ready to make their debut to the public and make a new history. How you manage the band will determine their future.

name: Cat Game
description: Cat Game is a super cute game where you assemble the puzzle with cats.

name: Omega Squad
description: Lead a team of marines inside a space station infested with monsters. Level up your squad and upgrade your weapons in order to clean the station of any threat. But don't forget to manage your squad as health and fatigue will play a big role in your squad's performance.

name: Hungry Galaxies
description: Hungry Galaxies is a deadly space survival game. Seek out constellations of Star Matter to grow your mass and evolve, increasing your gravity and gaining new abilities. But watch out! Space is a dangerous place.

name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Retro Collection: Collector's Edition
description: A blast from the past! Bill & Ted's Retro Collection includes BIll & Ted's Excellent Video Game Adventure and Bill & Ted's Excellent Gameboy Adventure A bogus Journey!

name: My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
description: Use the power of math to bring Equestria back to balance in this My Little Pony Explorer game by LeapFrog.

name: Outer Space Survival
description: In Outer Space Survival you play either alone or with others as a stranded astronaut who needs to repair his spaceship in order to escape from this planet. After that, you can explore space, complete missions, or settle on a planet and build a base.

description: Sword of Sia: Lady Sia 2 (aka Lady Sia II) is a cancelled action adventure / platform game that was in development in 2002 / 2003 for the Gameboy Advance. It seems that Lady Sia 2 was almost complete (it was even rated by ESRB), but in 2003 RFX had to close down and TDK Mediactive was acquired by Take-Two Interactive. Lady Sia 2 vanished with the closure of its development studio and publisher.

name: Hop for the Best
description:
Hop For The Best is an indie clay-style platformer game in which you play as Forgy, an adorable little frog chasing hope for a better life.

Sprint, roll, climb, dash, and hop through beautiful clay inspired worlds. With no way to attack and danger at every turn, all you can do is… Hop For The Best!

Hop For The Best Features four gameplay modes. Standard Mode, One-Life Mode, Kid’s Mode, and Challenge Mode.

name: Derelikt
description: DERELIKT is a short narrative FPS inspired by Alien Resurrection (PS1, 2000) and Doom 3 (PC, 2004), with a dash of cosmic horror. It aims to recreate the PS1 aesthetic as faithfully as possible.

name: Carnivalé
description: Based on the obscure animated movie of the same name. Similar to the Nintendo 64 version, the objective is to rescue your friends by winning Micro Machines-style races.

name: Panzer Campaigns Budapest '45
description: It was dawn on New Year's Day in the last year of the war. The enemies of the Reich were closing in on both the East and West Fronts. The Germans had squandered much of their last panzer reserves against the Americans at the Battle of the Bulge. In the east, the lines were holding pending the next major offensives by the Soviet juggernaut, and while Stalin continually hounded his generals to finish off the pocket of German and Hungarian troops holding Budapest, the Germans still had another offensive in them. They launched Operation Konrad - an offensive that almost succeeded in relieving the surrounded troops. Can you succeed where the Germans failed?

name: The Ultimate Might and Magic Archives
description: The Ultimate Might and Magic Archives brings together the first five games of the award-winning Might and Magic series--from Secret of the Inner Sanctum to Darkside of Xeen (also includes Swords of Xeen and World of Xeen). This is a definite must-have for RPG veterans and novices alike. Might and Magic: Secret of the Inner Sanctum. Find the secret of the Inner Sanctum. Cross oceans, climb mountains, search castles and dungeons, all in 3-D color perspective. Use 94 different spells and over 250 magic items to deal with over 200 monsters of various descriptions and personality profiles. Might and Magic 2: Gates to Another World. Embark on a glorious journey, then save the world of CRON and yourself. Hundreds of quests matched to your personal proficiency will test your ingenuity, and over 250 animated monsters will contest your might in an advanced combat system; 96 spells, more than 250 weapons and items, two new character classes, hirelings, and 15 secondary skills will aid your cause. Might and Magic 3: Isles of Terra. Terra awaits you. Prepare to be charmed by its magic and tested by its mighty power. Lead a party of adventurers to rendezvous with the legendary wizard, Corak. From dark moldy dungeons, through corridors of hewn stone and timber, and onward to the lofty frozen peaks of Terra, you will uncover the mysteries that surround the exotic islands in the Great Sea. Bizarre and intriguing creatures will challenge you along the way and in the many towns and castles that dot your path. Might and Magic 4: Clouds of Xeen. Explore the Land of Xeen--a world that has fallen under the iron grip of a diabolical overlord. Create a party of adventurers and journey to the four corners of your imagination as you strive to complete your mission. Take on fantastic quests, fearsome monsters, and challenges beyond compare. When you are ready, journey to the cloud world and face the ultimate foe: Lord Xeen himself. Might and Magic 5: Darkside of Xeen. The Tyrant Alamar appeared shortly after the Night of the Falling Stars and deposed Queen Kalindra, ruler of the humans. Alamar's army has besieged the Dragon Pharaoh's pyramid, and rebel monsters are ravaging the countryside and destroying the travel pyramids. Humans and their ilk have been confined to the slums of Castleview. And now fate has elected you and your friends to carry a message of vital importance to one of the few people who can still make a difference. Might and Magic: Swords of Xeen. Nothing is known about Havec, the world on the other side of a newly discovered magical pyramid, except that the evil Lord Xeen, who nearly destroyed two worlds, regularly traveled through the pyramid for unknown purposes. Travel from the small city of Greyhaven in the world of Xeen to Havec in this game that reprises the popular game system of World of Xeen in a new and challenging adventure. Install both Clouds of Xeen and Darkside of Xeen on your hard drive to create the World of Xeen. Journey back and forth and solve the multiple crossover quests to experience a special third end game.
